summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingClinique Almost Lipstick in Black Honey, Pink Honey, and Nude Honey. Sheer, buildable Clinique Almost Lipstick melts into lips, playing up their natural color. In three flexible shades that look different on everyone.
details: DetailsBenefitsNot quite lipstick, not quite gloss - its texture is more like a tinted lip balm you can easily layer.Emollient-rich sheer lipstick glides on to a sleek, soft-shine finish.Iconic Shade Black Honey:Clinique's cult classic Black Honey is the #1 Lip Color Shade in the U.S.*It's so loved, 7 Black Honey Lipsticks are sold every minute globally.**Black Honey is famous for its chameleon-like ability to flatter all skin tones yet look different on everyone.The secret is its perfect blend of blue, red, and yellow pigments in a creamy, sheer base that melts into lips, playing up their natural color.Don't be fooled by the way it looks in the tube. Black Honey glides on as a sheer, glossy slip of lightweight color.Fan-Favorite Pink Honey:Soft, sheer pink adds a rosy touch of color and shine to lips.First at Ulta, NEW Nude Honey:The only nude you need. A surprisingly flexible nude that looks different on every lip.The secret is its perfect mix of warm and cool pigments that blend with your lips for a shade unique to you.Free of: parabens, phthalates.Allergy tested. 100% fragrance free.*Circana / U.S. Prestige Beauty Total Department/Specialty, Makeup Sales, 12 months ending December 2024.**Based on internal Clinique data, January 2024 - December 2024.Key Ingredients95% conditioning ingredients.Item 2640692How To UseApply lipstick directly to lips.Can be worn alone or layered under or over other lip color and lip liners. We recommend pairing with Clinique's Quickliner for Lips Lip Liner in Intense Cafe.Swipe on one coat for a sheer tint. Keep building it for a little more drama.IngredientsRicinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Glyceryl Triacetyl Ricinoleate, Cetyl Ricinoleate, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax\Candelilla Cera\Cire De Candelilla, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax\Copernicia Cerifera Cera\Cire De Carnauba, Synthetic Wax, Benzyl Alcohol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, [+/- Mica, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Iron Oxides (CI 77492), Iron Oxides (CI 77499), Bismuth Oxychloride (CI 77163), Carmine (CI 75470), Red 6 (CI 15850), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Red 22 Lake (CI 45380), Red 28 Lake (CI 45410), Red 30 Lake (CI 73360), Red 33 Lake (CI 17200), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140), Yellow 6 Lake (CI 15985)].Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply lipstick directly to lips.Can be worn alone or layered under or over other lip color and lip liners. We recommend pairing with Clinique's Quickliner for Lips Lip Liner in Intense Cafe.Swipe on one coat for a sheer tint. Keep building it for a little more drama.
ingredients: Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax\Candelilla Cera\Cire De Candelilla
Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax\Copernicia Cerifera Cera\Cire De Carnauba

reviews.headline: Yes, will purchase again!
reviews.comments: I first purchased the Clinique Black Honey a while back and couldn't wait to try the new colors. I went with Nude Honey and it is such a neutral , natural color and perfect for everyday use!

reviews.headline: I would definitely buy this product again.
reviews.comments: I love this color! Black honey is too dark for me, but pink honey is a perfect shade for me!

reviews.headline: Clinique Cult Following!
reviews.comments: I keep buying this Black Honey lipstick over and over! Love the color and it looks great on everyone!

reviews.headline: Have not received
reviews.comments: Disappointed in service.

reviews.headline: Still haven't received my order after 2 weeks.  Disappointed
reviews.comments: Disappointed in service.

reviews.headline: almost lipstick
reviews.comments: I lips fee so good a lot of moisturizer.

reviews.headline: Constant Companion
reviews.comments: This lip product is on my vanity, in my purse, in my pocket and in my traveling go-bag.  Moisturizes my lips and makes them better with subtle, but flattering color.  The price is fair and the packaging well thought out.A look that precedes all the look-alike in the Market today.   Can't beat a classic!

reviews.headline: Will Buy Again
reviews.comments: Love all three shades!

reviews.headline: The lip color I've been searching for
reviews.comments: I've been searching for a lightweight lip color with a natural, flattering color and this one hit the nail on the head. It gives the perfect hint of color and moisture without being sticky or overwhelming.

reviews.headline: Trying something new
reviews.comments: This was not a color preferred by this customer. This lip product does provide moisture to the lips.

reviews.headline: This is the best
reviews.comments: This is the best. Great for everyday, not too dark/not too light.

reviews.headline: Needs Immediate Revamping Now Clinique
reviews.comments:
I have developed a extreme dislike for the formulation of  Clinique's 'Almost Lipstick' product. A major con is the pigmentation has significantly diminished. Having purchased it multiple times, I've noticed that each time it resembles Vaseline applied over fading, washed-out lipstick. 

One of my primary concerns with this product is the inefficient tube design, which renders the remaining product unusable when nearing depletion, forcing users to either employ a tool to extract the remaining product or discard the tube with unused product still inside. 

Consequently, I firmly believe that the tube's design is flawed and requires revision. I am confident that this will be my final purchase of this lip product.

P Although the color appears beautiful and deceptively pigmented, the reality is that repeated application is necessary to achieve a semblance of color, and even then, it resembles grease over faded lipstick. 

To maintain its reputation as a premier cosmetic brand, Clinique should reconsider this product's formulation and packaging, enhancing the pigmentation and providing a more functional tube design that enables users to utilize the entire product without difficulty. The current design is unbecoming of a well-established brand.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again and again!
reviews.comments: I've loved this product for two decades!

reviews.headline: Do not buy
reviews.comments: It's literally the WORST lipstick ever!!! I purchased it because I left my favorite lipstick back home. I didn't want to spend over $30 for a new one, so I got this one because it was on sale!!! You're better off just wearing Chapstick!

reviews.headline: One of my favorites for 30 plus years
reviews.comments: Just go out and buy it. Trust me

reviews.headline: Great color!
reviews.comments: I love this lipstick. It is a sheer blackish purple. I am very fair with blonde hair and blue eyes but it' still looks great! And I got it half off during the 21 days of beauty sale! Score!

reviews.headline: Good application
reviews.comments: I bought this product on sale and the only shade that it was on sale was in black honey. I was skeptical about the dark color. But when I applied it, it was very thin and sheer. So the color was a lot lovier on the lips.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: Love how it feels on my lips

reviews.headline: This lippie is a classic!
reviews.comments: I can't count how many times I have owned Black Honey Almost Listick over my lifetime. If I don't have a full sized on in my purse, I almost always have a couple of travel sized ones somewhere nearby. I love that Clinique has extended the Black Honey lineup and have been enjoying the mascara recently as well.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: The color is perfect; Better than black honey for me!

So easy to wear! Sheer, smooth, and enhances my natural lip
I live laugh LOVE this color and product
media.caption: Supa cute!

media.headline: It's cute, doesn't last long enough
media.caption: Again color is super cute but just doesn't last long enough for the price!!

media.headline: I have bought this lipstick times two...LOVE it!!!
media.caption: Happy Momma!

media.headline: Never Again
media.caption: My lips after using the product

faceoff_positive.comments: For the past 8 years I have bought this product. I swear by it! It's beautiful, natural, moisturizing. You can dress it up or dress it down. I wear it almost every day!
faceoff_positive.headline: Can't leave the house with out it!

faceoff_negative.comments: I really like the consistency of this lipstick. It's not too heavy & not sticky like lipgloss tends to be. I only wish there were more colors available. I didn't think this shade worked well with my skin tone.
faceoff_negative.headline: Love the lipstick, not the color
